level.text: 3105.1 A license issued under this chapter shall expire on September 30 of eachdd-numbered year.
3105.2 A license issued under this chapter shall be effective until September0 of the first odd-numbered year following issuance of the license or for two2) years, whichever is less.
Source: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 7853, 7856 (October 23, 1992).
